alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 31 at 11:29PM EST until January 01 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern New Haven County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated minor coastal flooding is also possible during high tide Sunday morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Do not drive through flooded roadways.
